solution_line_template: Lars can bake {loaves_per_hour} x {baking_hours_per_day} = <<{loaves_per_hour}*{baking_hours_per_day}={loaves_per_day}>>{loaves_per_day} loaves of bread every day.
She can also bake {baguettes_per_two_hours} x {num_two_hour_periods} = <<{baguettes_per_two_hours}*{num_two_hour_periods}={baguettes_per_day}>>{baguettes_per_day} baguettes every day.
Therefore the total bread she can bake is {loaves_per_day} + {baguettes_per_day} = <<{loaves_per_day}+{baguettes_per_day}={total_breads}>>{total_breads}.
